overview.en: DIM is an open source project of decentralized instant messaging protocol, as well as the name of the open communication platform built on top of this protocol. DIM has a wide usage from building a social network product, exchanging data between blockchains or enterprises, to bridging programs in Internet of Things. This is achieved by combining many innovations, such as asymmetric cryptography, extensible and high-performance service nodes, and the address naming service. DIM is the new generation of communication standard to drive the future internet.
overview.zh: DIM是一个开源的去中心化即时通讯协议，也是一个由众多服务提供商共同构建的开放的通讯平台。其协议框架在国内亦称作“点讯”。 DIM的应用前景十分广阔，不仅可以作为社交产品的搭建基础，也可以做成跨链、跨企业的数据交换工具，还可以应用到物联网通讯。DIM结合了众多创新，包括由非对称密码生成的通讯地址、可扩展的通讯节点、以及完全去中心化的地址名称目录，可望成为驱动万物互联的新一代底层通讯技术及网络。
